com.ibasco.agql.core

Interface Credentials


  • public interface Credentials
    An immutable class for storing credentials
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      byte[] getPassphrase()
      The passphrase.

      Invalidates this instance
      default boolean isEmpty()
      isEmpty.

    • Method Detail

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Invalidates this instance

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks if the credentails is currently in a valid state
        Returns:
        true if the credentials are valid

      • isEmpty

        default boolean isEmpty()

        isEmpty.

        Returns:
        true if the passphrase is empty or null

      • getPassphrase

        byte[] getPassphrase()
              throws InvalidCredentialsException
        The passphrase. If the credentials has been marked as invalidated, then an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        The passphrase in byte array format
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - when the credentials have been invalidated by the remote server.
